org.hps.record.evio

Class EvioFileSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.freehep.record.source.AbstractRecordSource
      • org.hps.record.AbstractRecordQueue<org.jlab.coda.jevio.EvioEvent>
        • org.hps.record.evio.EvioFileSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.freehep.record.source.RecordSource

    public final class EvioFileSource
extends AbstractRecordQueue<org.jlab.coda.jevio.EvioEvent>
    A basic implementation of an AbstractRecordSource for supplying EvioEvent objects to a loop from a list of EVIO files.
